videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: I added one card to this deck and reached Mythic immediately
videos.description:
But yeah, I started on Diamond 1.4! I still think Blue / White control is really good, it just doesn't need new cards. I love playing it, so that is how I am going for Mythic!

More UW Control: https://youtu.be/hMPMAoR1hX0

Decklist - https://moxfield.com/decks/LNJv00xTLUyj5wHGhkDIMQ
